snippet: Mr. Cuomo on Tuesday granted pardons to three men who had already completed their sentences.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo issues pardons, first of his term, to Seymour Hunter and Gerardo Alvarez, who were convicted of drug offenses in 1994 and 2002; also pardons Rocco Paciello, who was convicted of statutory rape in 1988.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cuomo on Tuesday granted pardons to three men who had already completed their sentences.

headline.main: Cuomo Issues Pardons for First Time in Office
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Issues Pardons For First Time in Office
